item.title: Roadmap
item.description: At Hege, we like to stay flexible so nothing is set in stone. The crypto market changes like the wind, so to stay relevant, we have to adapt.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hege is more than just a project with memes and a storyline. We are aiming to build a community full of humor, transparency and knowledge. The original concept for Hege was for him to win over his crush, Hegena, but as the project progressed, the team realized that thereâ€™s other narratives that they can utilize, alongside the storyline.

item.title: Content and Brand
item.description: Brand is critical in achieving our goals, and that’s why it is always being adjusted, improved and adapted.

item.title: Mission
item.description: Hege is more than a meme. We’re building a community that laughs together, learns together, and thrives together.
